Headline: #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Exp.Temp Northbound Reroute near Lower Wacker/Michigan
ShortDescription: NB 120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Exp. buses are temp. rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Loyola.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Loyola. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
